audio_file: Relay the message John Melvin Dela Frez Rosalinda Trecene 645025080468 030525.wav

transcription.text: Hello po, pwede po kay Mr. Mark. By the way, Ma'am Elvin de la Presse from Credit Max over the recorded line and I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ma'am, makikisuy lang po sana kami sa inyo regarding kay Mr. Mark, yung regarding sa kanyang Maya Bank po na maasikas niya na po ngayong araw yung kanyang Maya Bank. Pasabi na lang po sana sa kanya, Ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes, po. Yes, po. Yung Maya Bank na, Ma'am, pa-inform na lang po siya, Ma'am, na pakiasikaso na po yung kanyang Maya Bank po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Then, pakisagot po yung mga tawag po namin sa kanya dahil tinatawagan po namin siya. Hindi niya po nasasagot po yung mga tawag namin maghapon. Pasabi na lang po sa kanya, Ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Sir, excuse me po. Kasi po, wala na po siya dito sa Pilipinas. Nasa South na po siya. Bumalik na po siya ulit doon.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay. Pa-inform na lang po sa kanya, Ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kaya, bakit yung tinatawag niya yung number niya, eh, not available kasi nasa abroad na po siya.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay. Okay. Kaya naman pala. So, Ma'am, paano na lang po, Ma'am, pa-inform na lang po siya, Ma'am, yung regarding po sa kanyang Maya Bank po dito po sa...
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Inform na lang po, Ma'am, na pakiasikaso niya na po. Okay, po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: O, sige sabihin ko. Nasa work pa kasi yun eh. Tsaka busy din yun kasi ano oras na ba doon? Five hours kasi ang ano doon eh. Basta pa sige sabihin ko po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige, po. Marami pong salamat po, Ma'am, and have a nice day po. Thank you, po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Basta pa sige sabihin ko po. Okay, thank you po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

translation.tagalog: Hello po, pwede po kay Mr. Mark. By the way, Ma'am Elvin de la Presse from Credit Max over the recorded line and I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank.
translation.english: Hi, I'm Mark, I'm from the United States, and I'm calling from the United States Embassy in Mexico City.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, makikisuy lang po sana kami sa inyo regarding kay Mr. Mark, yung regarding sa kanyang Maya Bank po na maasikas niya na po ngayong araw yung kanyang Maya Bank. Pasabi na lang po sana sa kanya, Ma'am.
translation.english: I'm sorry, but I'm not going to be able to help you with your Maya-Bonus, so I'm going to ask you to help me with your Maya-Bonus.

translation.tagalog: Yes, po. Yes, po. Yung Maya Bank na, Ma'am, pa-inform na lang po siya, Ma'am, na pakiasikaso na po yung kanyang Maya Bank po.
translation.english: Yes, yes, yes, that's the Maya Bank, ma'am, just inform him, ma'am, that he's taking care of his Maya Bank.

translation.tagalog: Then, pakisagot po yung mga tawag po namin sa kanya dahil tinatawagan po namin siya. Hindi niya po nasasagot po yung mga tawag namin maghapon. Pasabi na lang po sa kanya, Ma'am.
translation.english: We'll call him back, but he won't answer our calls all day long, so we'll just say, Ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Sir, excuse me po. Kasi po, wala na po siya dito sa Pilipinas. Nasa South na po siya. Bumalik na po siya ulit doon.
translation.english: I'm sorry, but I'm not sure if you're in the Philippines or South Korea, but I'm sure you're in the Philippines.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Pa-inform na lang po sa kanya, Ma'am.
translation.english: Okay, just let him know, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Kaya, bakit yung tinatawag niya yung number niya, eh, not available kasi nasa abroad na po siya.
translation.english: So, why did he call that number, uh, not available because he's abroad.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Okay. Kaya naman pala. So, Ma'am, paano na lang po, Ma'am, pa-inform na lang po siya, Ma'am, yung regarding po sa kanyang Maya Bank po dito po sa...
translation.english: Okay. Okay. So, Ma'am, how about, Ma'am, just inform him, Ma'am, that regarding his Maya Bank is here in...

translation.tagalog: Inform na lang po, Ma'am, na pakiasikaso niya na po. Okay, po.
translation.english: Just inform him, ma'am, that he's taking care of it.

translation.tagalog: O, sige sabihin ko. Nasa work pa kasi yun eh. Tsaka busy din yun kasi ano oras na ba doon? Five hours kasi ang ano doon eh. Basta pa sige sabihin ko po.
translation.english: Oh, okay, I'll tell you what. It's still work. It's busy too. What time is it?

translation.tagalog: Sige, po. Marami pong salamat po, Ma'am, and have a nice day po. Thank you, po.
translation.english: Thank you very much, Ma'am, and have a nice day.

translation.tagalog: Basta pa sige sabihin ko po. Okay, thank you po.
